titleStmt.title: Religio militis a sermon preached to the artillery-company, October 24, 1672, at St. Michaels in Cornhil / by John Meriton, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Meriton, John, 1636-1704.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with slight loss of text.
